Description: Rim sherd of Chian Mature Animal Style pottery heavy chalice; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky black below; part of lotus flower in added white outline with added red centre; exterior: chequer pattern around rim, above stopt maeander band between pairs of dilute lines; below, dot and billet band; undetermined motif at bottom.
Curator's comments: for parallels, see Lemos no. 427 from Emporio and British Museum 1924,1201.558.
Bibliographic references: Lemos 1991 / Archaic Pottery of Chios. The Decorated Styles (p. 262, no. 537)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1550) (phase 2)
